targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "uptime_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "uptime_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'idle' AND "host" = 'goldenpc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'idle' AND "host" = 'brick') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ping_value" WHERE ("host" = 'brick' AND "type_instance" = '10.42.42.41' AND "type" = 'ping') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
